injury.name: Disease
injury.description: * Disease can not be healed or improved by common AID checks: you must seek professional medical attention. * Any time a Five of Pentacles is drawn: * If in Combat: take 8HP of damage. This damage can not be offset with Shields. * If outside of Combat: take a Minor Injury of the GM's choice. * Take 4 Corruption Points to instantly heal Disease.
injury.flavor: Something has made you very sick.
